Message:
Some time after Skuld
returned to her hometown,
and Zara joined the military,

I invited Priscilla to
go outside the village
for the first time.

She had been crushed
ever since the two had left,

so I wanted to cheer her up...
even if just a little.

Priscilla was worried about
stepping outside, but...

I held her hand so
she wouldn’t get lost,
and the two of us had
so much fun.

It was my first time
seeing a village so lively...

My first time in forever
seeing Priscilla’s smile.
